website_summaries.verdict: As long as you don't mind a little extra thickness, this budget-priced option will get the job done as well as most others. Affordable and effective.
pros: Tough tempered glass construction with a precision fit will keep your console screen protected from corner to corner
Comes with 2 screen protectors, cleaning cloth, blue dust film, and application sticker guides for easy handling
cons: Thickness can make for a tight docking fit
Some issues with air bubbles, especially in the corners

customer_reviews.title: Generally sucky protectors
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't go on right, second one shattered from a light tap, first replacement had bubbles all over, second replacement had dust and bubbles that would not go. Somewhere in the process some small scratches appeared on my screen, probably from the overly sticky dust removers or the cleaning cloths. Waiting on second set of replacements to arrive, even if they're somehow perfect my review will not change. Customer support is fairly decent but it really doesn't matter when the product is cheap and hassling.
customer_reviews.author: Deflargo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice kit, couldn't imagine any better for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to replace a film screen protector that was on my Switch. I am very happy with this screen protector. The tempered glass feels great and is a perfect fit. The price was low, but the quality is high, packaged nicely as well. It comes with everything needed except for a wet screen cleaner moist towelette. The kit and screen are very nice and it went on very easily. No air bubbles and was easy to line up. (I would advise lining up on the bottom edge to avoid any air bubbles on the top edge.) Would 100% recommend and can't see how you could get a better kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HectorCC

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector isn't great at all. I always get them for all my devices and this one is the worst. Applying it isn't easy and it doesn't stick very well to the screen. Bubbles galore after applying and one side of it isn't even adhering. I took the first one off and had to use the second one, and the edges of the second isn't sticking. I have applied many screen protectors and I am pretty familiar with how to do it and have it look perfect. I am guessing the fit of this isn't great which is why it looks like crap. I may just remove the second one and buy something else that may possibly fit better....hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: jchan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to install!! No bubbles its actually really simple and fun to watch. Super thick and smooth to the touch. I'll be buying more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Barb L

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own prep supplies
customer_reviews.text: The screen themselves seem fine but the prep items aren't great. Dust remover felt like it would damage my screen and the wipe given is more like a cleaning solution that left residue. Would recommend anyone buying to use scotch tape and isopropyl alcohol instead. That being said, I'd currently say it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tomyo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bubble Free
customer_reviews.text: If fits on the switch just fine. But it's definitely not bubble free. You have to be extra careful when putting these on as you may end up with some dust or air bubbles stuck on the inside of your screen. Obviously in case of there being bubbles you can just lift back up the protector and reapply to it in hopes of removing the bubbles once and for all but that's the equivalent of going on a grand skyrim quest for people like me who are bad at putting these things on in general lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better off letting your screen scratch.
customer_reviews.text: THis is a POS. The dust rags they give you add dust to your screen. The sticky pads to eliminate the dust leave glue residue on your screen ruining it before you even put on the shield. The shield is impossible to get to lay flat. I am not talking about dust in the way, I mean the edges never lay flat on the screen. It looks horrible. You'd better off taking your chances with out it. At least your screen would look nice for a little while. This product makes nearly destroys your screen with glue residue before looking horrible on the Switch anyway.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Not sized correctly. I tried both protectors included and they are both the same. They are just slightly bigger than the screen of my switch. This causes one side to hang over the edge a bit too much and not stick all way now. It's already peeling up away from the screen so it's basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Both screen protectors arrived in good condition, I decided to use my own microfiber cloth that was brand new and a small amount of eye glass lens cleaner instead of the provided supplies. I use a light to make sure the switch screen was smudge and lint free and lined up the protector. The adhesive does all the work. The protector attached smoothly other than a few small bubbles that were easy to work out. I don't understand some of the reviews that I read about it being hard to install, a monkey could install this
customer_reviews.author: R. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Working great! No bubbles the morning after install
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far! Image on the switch is clear, and I feel much more comfortable using it now since the Switch itself has a plastic screen. Had no problem aligning the screen using the "hinge method" I have used on multiple phones for installing tempered glass screen protectors. Installation note about bubbles: I did have 4 decent sized bubbles immediately after installing that I couldn't push out, so I let it sit overnight. The next morning only 2 bubbles remained, and I was able to push them out quickly. So don't worry if you have a few bubbles that won't go away right after you install, give it a bit of time and try pushing them out later.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a pro at installing screen protectors. I followed all the instructions and still had dust which caused bubbles which doesn’t work for me at all. The yellow screen cloth actually added tiny dots of dust, even after using the dust removal sticker. Meh. Tried twice and failed.
customer_reviews.author: CloverQueen

customer_reviews.title: Little tricky to smooth out bubbles but looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Seller engaged & helpful. We bought this for a 12 year old boy’s Switch. It fit great & looked good-it was a little tricky to get all the bubbles out-I had to lift up the right side several times-finally had success when I lifted right side and slowly smoothed it over from left to right until it was on tight. Be careful not to get fingerprints on the screen by touching the sticky side. It would’ve helped to have better instructions-having previously put on a similar screen on my iPhone helped.
customer_reviews.author: Dyan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install if at all possible.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to install if at all possible. Went through four protectors each had bubbles on perimeter. It seems like it’s slightly too big for screen because it never sits flush on screen on all four sides. Returned, will try other manufacture when I get my credit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Full screen, very little room for errors, just the way it should be.
customer_reviews.text: It covers the whole screen. I've done a thousand screen protectors (exaggeration), and if there's an issue, it's usually the person's fault. Take it slow, be patient, and work from the sides. Bubbles will go away if you press down. There's very little room for error. JETech has also honored the warranty, so this is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought a pair of these! They work like an ABSOLUTE CHARM. I am very irresponsible with my switch, as I regularly throw it into my purse along with my keys and jewelry... it's a miracle that my actual screen is still pristine, thanks to these!! They are easy to install, take off (even when it is cracked in a million places), and re-install.
customer_reviews.author: Elodie

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and easy to install. Well, mostly easy. i did have to pull it back up to release some air bubbles that managed to get under it during installation. So far so good, but it's not like i'm careless with my electronics. This was mostly to protect the screen just in case. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to buy a screen protector for their Switch. Price and quality can't be matched.
customer_reviews.author: vesra

customer_reviews.title: Only brand I will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: They make superb screen protectors for iPhone, iPad, and of course Switch too!! A few reasons why I love these - precisely cut - great oleophobic coating - price - more than one comes in the pack - somehow always end up with a perfect installation Look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Baldemar

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m surprised at the reviews and how bad people are on installing these and blaming the product. It took me less then 15 minutes. Double check their is no lint. Or dust. This isn’t something to rush. The protector is the exact size of the switch. Just align one side and line it down gently. Once sure push in the middle and let it do it’s thing. This product was much needed and if you do mess up. Not only is it cheaper then the ones you would get at retail stores it comes with two of them!! No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good tempered glass screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good tempered glass screen protectors. I like the fit of these in that it's difficult to tell they're even on the device. I wouldn't say the experience is particularly better than any other protectors as application of the protector itself is the standard affair. Two is probably more than I'll even need as I rarely leave the house with the Switch, so to me it was also a fair value.
customer_reviews.author: Host

customer_reviews.title: Not a good solution
customer_reviews.text: After 40 min of trying to get this installed without bubbles I gave up. Doesn’t seem like a very good product. I’m just glad I was able to remove it without damaging the screen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: They really work!!
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors are my savior. My son dropped the switch and I thought the screen cracked a chip in the middle top edge but it was only the protector. I left it on and another time my 3 year old got ahold of it and I got it and saw it had cracks all over the screen I was devastated I just knew he had cracked the whole thing. My husband pulls the protector off and there was no damage to the actual screen. It was amazing. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: xreviewqueen

customer_reviews.title: Protect Your Switch With a Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector will help protect your Nintendo Switch from scratches. It is worth picking this up to make sure you do not have any accidental scratches on your screen. You get two in the packet and cleaning supplies to apply the glass covering.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Worest screen I have ever purchased, period!
customer_reviews.text: How this thing got so high rated its beyond me, first of all the one of the two screen came damaged. I try to install the 2nd undamaged screen and it is by far the worest screen to install. There are bubbles everywhere and they are hard to push out. Once you finally deal with the bubbles, the edge of the screen won't seal, leaving huge bubble around the edge. This is a waste of my time and money. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and goes on easily
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when buying this because similar items had reviews stating the fit wasn't great. I can vouch for this one being tailor-made for the Switch. If you line it up right, this fits perfectly across the entire screen. I also saw a tip online to apply the screen protector in the bathroom with the shower on to avoid some of the dust floating in the air. Not sure if this actually helps, but I did so and I couldn't be happier with my application.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Krygsheld

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to install. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.text: The screen itself was sort of easy to install. It comes with 2 little pieces of tape that will hold the screen in place while you take off the cover for the adhesive side. Unfortunately, it does not come with anything to get rid of air bubbles. I did have one bubble present after i applied the protection but it went away the next day. It does come with 2 screen protectors in case you screw up the first time. Add a plastic card for air bubbles and maybe some more stickers to hold the screen protector and you'll have a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! Extremely durable & provides great protection. We have used this brand on all of our phones & Nintendo switch. Has protected our sons phone through many drops. Only screen protector I haven’t heard my husband complain once while putting them on (like others he complains about) Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I was disappointed with the amFilm one ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I was disappointed with the amFilm one because it doesn't go edge to edge. It makes my switch look weird because there's the black frame, then the screen cover, then the actual led screen. It looks too busy. I thought all the screen protectors were probably the same. It was a pleasant surprise to find out JETech goes edge to edge. I'm able to maintain the Switch clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to buy these then replace the whole screen
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best nitendo tempered glasses. It goes on easy and smooth and lasts a long time, I've had to buy this again to replace the one my kids broke. My little heathens aren't always gentle and are accident prone. Our switch screen stays protected and uncracked while the protector takes the hit. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector fits perfectly on my Nintendo Switch. It was fairly easy to put on, although some of the pictures on the included instructions on were hard to see/interpret. It comes with useful installation accessories such as the dust remover, the screen cleaner, and the tabs to help place the screen protector without having to touch the sticky side of the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Quickness05328

customer_reviews.title: Thick glass, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest installation ever- When I peeled the backing off and touched it onto the screen, the whole protector immediately attracted itself to the screen and plopped down perfectly onto the screen with no bubbles or dust. Just make sure to line it up before setting it down and that there's no dust floating around in the room. I always order my phone protectors from JETech and this one did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Had zero trouble applying
customer_reviews.text: Followed included instructions, used a clean work area, very nice screen cover. You guide the glass on with two sticky tabs. Letting it cure for now in case there's a bubble or two to smooth, but it seems fantastic. Can see screen perfectly clearly through it. Glad I did so as soon as I bought the Switch so that when I use a LABO headset it'll be as clear as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it advertised. I rather hate applying these stiff tempered glass screen protectors, but the redundant materials provided by most of them (this set has two of everything) gives you a bit of leeway. Aside from the frustration of cleaning and applying the screen correctly, it's a cinch and provides an invaluable line of defense against the inevitable scratch that will mar your otherwise shiny Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Lossing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cut and thoughtful accessories to help with installation!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a perfect cut; exactly fits the screen and holes. Easy to install without the bubbles. Especially appreciated the extra items provided to help install -- dust-removing sticker was a huge bonus! The extra adhesives provided to hold the glass was helpful so you do not get your fingerprints on the adhesive side.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install properly!
customer_reviews.text: The JE Tech Screen Protector was all that it said ot would be. The screen is super durable made of a thicker plastic than I thought it would be, it allowed me to use my controller without any difference and the tabs on the screen cover made proper installation a snap! I'm very pleased. Oh and of course, super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: L.K. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Went on perfectly and feels even better than the original plastic touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: Went on perfectly and feels even better than the original plastic touchscreen. Alleviates any concern of the dock scratching my screen until I get the diy portable dock. My only nitpick is the guide stickers were not sticky at all, but I had some left over from a different touchscreen. Not quite worth taking a star away, just make sure you have tape or something handy to create a hinge for precise application.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: A lot of finger smudges in hour one
customer_reviews.text: Even just after cleaning my fingers to install this, it takes a lot of smudge from my fingers in hour one. False advertisement, I wouldn't have bought if it is not oleophobic
customer_reviews.author: MyAnonAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: The application process went smooth, the feel on the screen was slightly different than other screen protectors I've used on phones, though I guess this is due to the fact that they aren't made for co constant touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Akash Patel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector works wonders. I purchased this screen protector as a back up, but ended up placing it right away. The installation process is simple enough, just a bit simpler than competitor brands; I had a bubble but after a couple hours, the bubble went away on its own, also the fit is perfect, giving you protection for the entire screen. Still, the touch screen is just as responsive as without the protector applied and it doesn't show signs of any scratches from sliding it in and out of the dock. Also, since it comes with two, I have a back up if I ever needed one.
customer_reviews.author: J Stunna

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, as long as you do it with a little bit of patience and avoid rushing it, you can apply it to where it looks like there is no screen protector at all. Touch screen works nicely with it installed, fits nicely and is easy enough for someone to install it even if they don't have much experience installing screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B

customer_reviews.title: doesn't scratch easy
customer_reviews.text: I almost always put my switch in wring the first time and see my friends switch screen with light scratches already because of the same thing. My screen has no scratches and neither does the protector
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mcphee

customer_reviews.title: Seller is really desperate for feedback
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and installed it easily. It looks like it will protect my switch pretty well but I haven't had enough time to say for sure - it just arrived within the last week. I'm writing the review anyway because the seller keeps sending me emails asking me to review this product and I want them to stop. I will update HARSHLY if something goes wrong with the product and I have to come back to this review but until then I will assume this is a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Durable, crystal clear protector
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the Nintendo Switch. Easy to align. Went on fairly smoothly, though there were three bubbles, one the size of a quarter. Not sure if these will go away over time or not. I intend to primarily use the switch with a television, so the screen protector was more of a safeguard against scratches while occasionally inserting/removing from the dock.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Product is nice but damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The glass screens are really nice, two came in the pack, but unfortunately one of the two I received was shattered. It was likely damaged during shipping since the postal worker shoved the package in my mailbox and it was bent in half. At least one was intact so I installed it on my Switch. It fits perfectly over the touchscreen, no overlap. I had some minor scratches on my Switch screen and I can no longer see them with the screen protector on.
customer_reviews.author: angie anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very good screen protectors!
customer_reviews.text: Really good screen protectors overall with only minor issues installing. I removed mine once to reapply since a corner was not adhering well at first. I reapplied and it seems a lot better. You really have to pay attention to centering the screen protector perfectly due to the design of the Switch. Great deal especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wigington

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack because it takes a couple tried
customer_reviews.text: Using the cleaning tools was a challenge it self because the cloth left dust and the dust sticker left strikes. So it took several round just to try to clean it. Then when i get the screen on its bubble city i can seem to get the bubbles out and when i try to adjust it the corner cracks. So i move on to the next screen, annnd still bubbles. Havent had a screen protector this bad
customer_reviews.author: GIa smith

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Installation ‘Tools’
customer_reviews.text: The glass is nice and the protector works well but the included tools to assist with installation was so terrible to use. The included cloths are so linty that you HAVE to use the dust removal sticker, which does help remove the dust, but at the cost of leaving adhesive residue on the screen. Thankfully the adhesive is easily removable with rubbing alcohol but the included ‘tools’ made the installation MORE difficult than it needed to be.
customer_reviews.author: izziik

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Case Protected
customer_reviews.text: Many people argue with peel and stick that they have bubbles when finishing with the installation. But its really the way you set it up and how to adjust the glue onto the screen. My best method is to go from one corner to another while elimination the bubbles that it may have. With that said its also tempered glass, so its not gonna break easily as other products with the same value.
customer_reviews.author: NobleKnightRoy

customer_reviews.title: Blue sticker scratched my screen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of these to upgrade my old Nintendo plastic film cover that came with the Switch case on release. During installation, I used the blue sticker to remove dust from the screen. Turns out the glue on the sticker was too powerful and it attached very hard to the screen. After pulling it off I noticed there were marks on the screen that were not there before. Checked the other blue sticker and found that one didn't have such a strong glue on it, so I just got a bad one I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great - per all of these
customer_reviews.text: Great - per all of these, it is a little tricky to put on. The first one was a little crooked and I had to break it in order to take it off. It's good they ship two. Once it is on correctly, you barely notice it. Very elegant. The screen does not affect the responsiveness of the touch screen at all.
customer_reviews.author: KGSmoove

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is easy to install. The trick to not getting any bubbles is making sure there isn't any dust on the screen. A cloth is provided to clean the screen beforehand which is a huge plus. For the price, the protector is very good quality. It fit perfectly!! The extra screen is great in case you screw up the first one or to switch it out after a couple of months. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Kar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.. easy install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, very clear instructions and materials. Applied as instructed which took a couple of minutes. Took a while to get bubbles out and some stayed for a while. Left it alone and the next day, all the bubbles were gone. I do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mikael

customer_reviews.title: glad its a 2 pack..I think they give you one to practice with.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I put on looked like crap..the 2nd one however is PERFECT..no lint, bubbles, or anything and it fits great. Also protects your Switch from scratches when you put it in the dock. Super happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad guide tabs and cleaning cloth
customer_reviews.text: These are awful! The guide tabs provided are not sticky enough to hold the glass and it drops off the tabs easily. What’s worse is the yellow cloths provided shed and leave little specks everywhere. I used the blue sticky tape to remove lint but it must float all over the place because it got under BOTH and I ended up throwing them out. Huge waste of $7.
customer_reviews.author: S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Four inches is too much for this protector.
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to put on, but is not durable in any way. The first time I dropped my Switch the screen protector shattered. Normally this wouldn't be bad since that's what they are for, but I literally dropped my Switch 4 inches. I was sitting on the floor and bam... No more screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Art V

customer_reviews.title: Always Use Protection
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m the only one out there who sucks at installing screen protectors. It took me two peel offs to get it right. I was pleasantly surprised that that did not affect the adhesive of the item. Anyway, solid protection for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector is ok, terrible if you live in cold place.
customer_reviews.text: Boughtthe screen protector as a protection from the dock scratchin issue which it did thanks. But a month later the weather got really cold and after leaving the switch on my study desk over night the screen cracked 3 ways, at first i was ok sure why not i have another but after opening the pack the other screen protector was cracked as well. As a person who works mobile retail and puts screen protectors on daily. This one is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful screen protector for the Nintendo switch. I've seen this thing be used and abused and there is not a single scratch on the screen. We have not even needed to use the second protector in the pack yet and it's been 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennied

customer_reviews.title: I'd pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Well let's begin.....its was chipped when I got it. Smudges all over the inside of the cover. The plastic you peel off was so crooked it wouldn't come out of the box straight. And on and on..... like they say you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: justin robinson

customer_reviews.title: Awful instal method--- lots of bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to replace a damaged screen protector I installed before my dbrand skin, so I know the big bubble on the corner is because of my skin. But installed the first one on my husbands switch and could not get the bubbles out. Same happened on mine. Bad install method. 2 very not sticky tabs to hold it are you kidding me?? No squeegy for bubbles and no way to get bubbles out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen N Watters

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: I play my Switch in handheld and take it to work alot so a good screen protector was needed. I bought JETech other product for Switch (the rubberized grip case, which btw is amazing) and liked it. These tempered glass screen protectors are legit. Installation was alot easier than other tempered glass protectors ive had.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not use dust removing sticker!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers provided to remove dust from your screen are absurdly sticky. They were so sticky that they left adhesive residue on the screen. I then had to figure out how to get that off. What a pain! Then the placement stickers were so weak I couldn’t get them to act as the hinges without them popping off. Not buying this brand ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Megumills

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 10 stars I would!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came very nicely packaged and fit very well on the screen! Came with anything and everything you will need to ensure you properly and cleanly add the tempered glass to your screen 👍
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a bit tricky to install
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is durable but it seems the fit is a thicker than other screen protector and little wiggle room for error. First install had some bubble but second one was a lot easier. Overall good product once installed.
customer_reviews.author: toshiro2010

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice on the fingers, good optically, and fairly easy to apply. My gripe is that it makes my switch fit a little too snug in the dock now, where I have to push it down a little to make a good connection to the USB-C in there.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O.

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats these prices for Screen Protectors ... and you get 2. It was also the easiest installation process. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Parents, your kids NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: Tempered glass is a GODSEND. Have a kid who leaves their device laying around to be stepped on ? Get the tempered glass! We thought our sons switch was done for until we removed the tempered glass. It looks brand new now! Trust me, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Suarez

customer_reviews.title: OK screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job so far. Install was on par with other screen protectors. Coverage is good and no glare issues. There's a ton of options at this price point, and they're all probably comparable.
customer_reviews.author: BS AZ

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Describes
customer_reviews.text: Protects my screen perfectly. Takes a couple tries to install properly since it is the exact size as the screen. Even if the protector is over the edge just a little, it will not set properly. Other than that, it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: William Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. My grandson really likes it and likes that there's an extra one. Fast shipping and product was as described. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: First one went on without a hitch. There were initially a few bubbles but after awhile they slowly went away. I'm not sure how it will be coming off, but so far so good and much cheaper than buying from Gamestop or Nintendo direct.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Mlinarcik

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and easy to apply, for a budget price
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest Switch screen protector I could find with a 4.5 star rating, and it deserves it. Easy to apply, and feels glorious
customer_reviews.author: Hung-Su

customer_reviews.title: followed instructions, still had bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Will stick to liquid glass over tempered glass. 2nd attempt at a tempered glass protector and neither one was a pain free install.
customer_reviews.author: abraham de la rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just $1.99 for two of these plus free shipping?! These were great! They fit my Switch perfectly and were very easy to install. So far I'm still on only the first of two, and it doesn't even have so much as a scratch! No air bubbles either! I'm very pleased with these and absolutely recommend them! ^^
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: It works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protector when I got my daughter a Switch. I immediately applied this screen. After a little of a years worth of time, it's been dropped countless times. This protector definitely protected the screen as it broke in the stead of the screen itself. Check out my attached photo for proof of the awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: C. Speer

customer_reviews.title: good price. I've bought plenty of these for other ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, good price. I've bought plenty of these for other devices, but this is the nicest kit I've seen. Clear instructions, cleaning cloth and dust removing sticky stuff. I read another review that didn't like the "alignment strips", but I didn't use them. Just align the protector and drop it in place. Good to go :)
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Screen Protects!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screen cover. A bit on the large size so small bubbles on the edges, but with the other case on it covers so you can't see the edges. I am using both protectors on both switch units.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wong

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This Switch screen protector is amazing. It's very easy to apply and it's not one of those flimsy plastic screen protectors, it's tempered glass. This feels way better than the Switch's plastic screen. The screen protector doesn't add a lot of thickness to the Switch itself so it's still pretty easy to slide in and out of the dock. Overall, this is a pretty nice screen protector, I'd recommend it for anyone getting a Switch or looking for a screen protector for their Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Serhiy Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: If you are well versed in putting on screen protectors, this one is great for the switch. No bubbles, and no loose corners so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The protector is cut exactly to fit the screen so a bit of patience and a steady hand will net you a sweet ass protected screen. I can't say how durable the screen is but I know it's more protective than the generic plastic protector I've had on for over a year. Also it's a step up from having no protector on the screen and letting the dock scratch the system up.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Soler

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced screen protectors!!
customer_reviews.text: My switch screen protectors came in fast and safely with nice packaging. I am not very good at installing screen protectors and I'm always leaving air bubbles and crooked screens in place but not with these screen protectors! I LOVED how easy ans effortless it was. Just read the instructions carefully and use the guide stickers for a perfect alignment and installation (:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this product including their lifetime warranty. The costumer service was great when I sent them a request for a replacement. I received the replacement very fast and no shipping charge. I continue to buy their products for their quality and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: EAT

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I'll be buying more soon because I'm always ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I'll be buying more soon because I'm always dropping my phone. The screen protector cracks but not my actual screen! I just peel off the cracked protector and put on another. Reasonably priced and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Protect Screening
customer_reviews.text: A great product at a very affordable price. I was able to apply it easily, though even my best efforts allowed for a couple of fibres to get trapped beneath the protector. They are only visible when the unit is off, so who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Art VanDelay

customer_reviews.title: difficult to apply but still good
customer_reviews.text: I had a tough time applying mine and broke the first one in the pack (this item includes two screen protectors). Putting on the second one required repeated attempts but once I got it juuuust right - it was clear that the protector is a good product that I'd reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: spockle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No Wiggle Room
customer_reviews.text: I went specifically with this brand as we use them on the iPhone and love them. Installation was exactly the same so I was already used to that. My problem was that the protector is the exact same size of the screen and so if you're off by any amount, you have corners that have air pockets. Now that I've had to readjust it over and over, it looks bad. There is absolutely no wiggle room like you do on a phone. The product is great but the application is a pain. I'm going to have to use the second one in the pack to see if that ones goes on any better.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used JETech products in the past and have been very happy with them. Again the glass screen protector for the switch was perfect and installed without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: jpaver

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed something affordable and good for my girls nintendo switch screen. I ordered this product 2 came in the package and for the price you can’t beat that. They are smooth to the touch and very clear you couldn’t even tell it has a screen protector. The installation was fast n easy and the kit comes with everything you need. I would recommend this product because it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Saved my switch
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11 year old nephew who I let play with my switch, and he dropped the switch face down, the screen protector cracked by the actual screen survived. This screen protector is a must have for anyone with switch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to protect the screen of my 8 years old Nintendo switch. I was very please with the durability. It came with adhesive tabs to make installing it easy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: No bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Took my time and got a good bubble-free attachment. Seems solid and will pritext from that doxk issue people are having.
customer_reviews.author: Atom Teuoxtonion

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I use this brands screen protectors for my phone. They have always been easy to install and they do the job well. I'm glad to find the same is true for their product for the Switch. 1. Easy to install 2. Works 3. Low price
customer_reviews.author: Raheel Savani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this screen protector for my husband. It works great and is a great price. Glad I could find something useful and good quality but not pay a ton for it.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Vieth

customer_reviews.title: I Dropped my switch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dropped My Switch, both of my controllers and screen SHATTERED!! But i had the Screen protector so my switch is OKAY! Except my joy-cons.....
customer_reviews.author: Alan Castro

customer_reviews.title: good screen cover, no gripes so far.
customer_reviews.text: it does what it says as a switch screen cover. its nice and thick and not that hard to put on. not only is it reasonably priced but it comes with not one but two screen covers so if your first screen cover is damaged or you have another switch lacking a cover this is the screen cover for you
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Switch necessity
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my Switch, but fortunately it had this screen protector on it. It's thick enough to absorb the damage that my switch would have sustained. The fall cracked the screen protector, but my Switch was unharmed! Fortunately there was a 2nd screen protector included, and my switch has been wearing that one ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia and Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, i had a tiny bubble in the corner i couldnt push out but it dissolved the next day! The glass screen protector is way nicer then the switch glass give your switch a smooth glass it dosnt get covered with fingerprints or smuges easly
customer_reviews.author: Rob Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on the Nintendo Switch. They give your two protectors so if you botch up one, you can install the other. Does not work anymore once you lift it off the switch console, so you better get it right the second time.
customer_reviews.author: XP

customer_reviews.title: Shatters without even being touched
customer_reviews.text: I installed it very gently and correctly and it appeared fine. I placed it on a flat surface and the next day (nothing had touched it) there was shattering on the bottom. The device was sitting alone for a few months in an area that isn't at all subject to disturbance or vibration, and the screen was entirely shattered. The only redeeming factor is that it comes with two.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob K.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was easy to install. Now my Nintendo switch is protected from scratches. It doesn't affect the quality of the screen or anything I love it
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: From fit to finish it's a great screen protector! Easy to apply and clean up. And there's no issues with me tapping the screen with the switch when not using the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: RedFox

product_meta.title: JETech Screen Protector for Nintendo Switch 2017, Tempered Glass Film, 2-Pack
feature_bullets: Made with high quality 0.33mm thick premium tempered glass exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2017. Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife)
Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easy installation, bubble free
Retail package includes: 2-Pack tempered glass screen protector, cleaning cloth, blue dust film, instructions, guide sticker, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,822 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
